topics.body:
There's a birthday party happening upstairs
And it's all for me, who the fuck cares?
They don't notice if I never go and show my face
They just looking for a reason they can celebrate
I hate to waste the vanilla cake that they made for me
I'll tell the same stories, they'll pretend they never heard them

topics.body: Meh. Don't care. Just want something to read.
topics.author: 53e1859d6368723b93700000

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f7b31a63687270df1c0000#post_53f7b31a63687270df1c0000
Leina Vance from Queen's Blade
For some reason they made an image of her covered in blood with red eyes. In the actual anime, none of that actually happens. It's way too fanservice based and Leina herself is pretty basic.

So I got bored one day and thought "I could write a better story"
Partly inspired by the picture, I began writing a fan-retelling for fun where it's action based and more character focused. Fanservice is also toned way down

Not sure if it's actually any good but compared to the original, it's got to be better
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f7b5e86368723bf7100000#post_53f7b5e86368723bf7100000
Good, you don't lose anything by not watching it. It's kinda rubbish really but it's a guilty pleasure.

But fine, if you want to read it

"Queen's Blade: Divine Intervention":https://www.fanfiction.net/s/10552468/1/Queen-s-Blade-Divine-Intervention

I must warn you, I don't think it's very good but hey, if I got nothing but praise, I wouldn't improve.
